text: Ara ibrahima kartrka sbiya pitara magapherata kamana chila kebala se'i pratisrutira karane, ya tini tara sathe karechilena. Atahpara yakhana tamra kache ekatha prakasa pela ye, se allahara satru takhana tara sathe samparka chinna kare nilena. Nihsandehe ibrahima chilena bara komala hrdaya, sahanasila.
